data.actual_result: The tooltip is off-centered from the badge's icon
data.expected_result: The tooltip is centered over the badge like with the Nitro & Bug Hunter badges
data.short_description: Badge tooltips aren't centered over the Staff, Partner, & HypeSquad badges
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the profile of a user with the Staff, Partner, or HypeSquad badge and hover over it to display the tooltip
